resources.string: Effortlessly execute ADB commands on your Shizuku-enabled Android device.
aShell is still working. Please wait for it to finish or manually stop (by clicking the stop button) to run a new command

🧩 Shizuku Dependency: aShell requires a fully working Shizuku environment to function. Please ensure Shizuku is set up before using this app.
👨‍💻 Basic Knowledge Required: Familiarity with ADB and Linux command-line basics is recommended for effective use.
🌐 Open Source: aShell is open-source and free to build. Contributions and translations are welcome via GitLab and POEditor.
‚ö†Ô∏è No Liability: We are not liable for any issues, data loss, or damage that may occur while using this app.

\uD83D\uDCDC Run ADB commands with ease‚Äîincludes built-in examples and bookmarking.\n\uD83D\uDCCA Handles continuous commands like logcat or top, with search and save options for output.\n\uD83C\uDFA8 Sleek UI with auto dark/light theme for a smooth, modern experience.
Failed to get data from external file manager. Aborting.

Shizuku is not installed or not properly configured on your device. aShell won\'t work without a proper Shizuku environment.
aShell is not designed for root-related uses. Aborting.
